metadata.title: The distribution of the rent–price relationship of agricultural land in Germany

data_sources.description: The German Agricultural Census 2010 provides comprehensive information on all farms in Germany, including data on the rent paid by farmers. This dataset was used to calculate local averages of land rents and prices for the study.
data_sources.access_conditions: Available through the Federal Statistical Office

data_sources.description: The OGA Lower Saxony dataset consists of plot-level data for all agricultural land sales in Lower Saxony during the period from the second quarter of 2007 to the first quarter of 2010. This data was originally collected for the purposes of the German Federal Building Code and was used to calculate local averages of land sales prices.
data_sources.access_conditions: Available through the OGA Lower Saxony

data_sources.source_name: Regional Statistical Database of the Federal Statistical Office and Statistical Offices of the Länder
data_sources.description: This database provides general economic indicators for the analysis, which were used to complement the farmland data in the study.
data_sources.access_conditions: Available through the Federal Statistical Office

assessment.findability_reason: Data sources are well-documented and accessible through official statistical offices.
assessment.accessibility_reason: Some datasets are publicly accessible, while others have restricted access.
assessment.interoperability_reason: Data formats are standard but lack structured metadata and semantic vocabularies.
assessment.reusability_reason: Data is reusable with proper attribution, but some datasets have restricted access and lack persistent identifiers.
